file_content.text: You are the mightier hunter. Have you spoken to my kin?
These trophies are magnificent! The shamans will hear your tale; you honor the hunt and the Slayers Three.
My kin and I have come to hunt. You are welcome to join us.
From the depths of the Spawn Nebula, the Slayers Three have come! Our shamans declare Rishi this year's hunting grounds.
Join us and know victory! Strip this world's predators of their bloody hides, and we will revel in ceremonial splendor.
The hunt is now! The reaping begins!
There will be fine hunting this year. A world full of challenges.
